subject: Baseball
Umpires
Souvenirs
lead_paragraph: Umpiring his 4,000th major league game Thursday, Joe West ejected Jim Riggleman, the Nationals’ interim manager, for arguing a checked-swing strikeout in the third inning.
snippet: Umpiring his 4,000th major league game Thursday, Joe West ejected Jim Riggleman, the Nationals’ interim manager, for arguing a checked-swing strikeout in the third inning.
